response.original_title: Just The Facts: Historical Icons: Gandhi
response.overview: Mohandas K. Gandhi was a man of peace who spent most of his life preaching non-violence to gain equality and freedom for the people of India. This informative program explores his struggle against the mighty British Empire and her colonies of India and South Africa. Gandhis words and deeds made him one of the most influential men of the 20th Century.
response.title: Just The Facts: Historical Icons: Gandhi
